html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11592019-08-07JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Jocelyn Geoffroy ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder prescribing (1) the period beginning on November 11, 2017 and ending on May 18, 2018 as an additional period during which the travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still resident in the former residence, shall be reimbursed to the Hon. JOCELYN GEOFFROY, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec; and 2) the period beginning on May 7, 2018 and ending on November 6, 2018 as an additional period during which the difference between the sale price of the Honourable Geoffroy's former residence and its fair market value be an expense for which a removal allowance shall be paid.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
